main.description: A response to a request for entropy. The rkey matches the RFE's rkey.

subject.description: The original record that needed entropy (copied from the RFE).

rfe.description: Points back to the RFE that was fulfilled.

values.description: Generated random values, one per request in the RFE.

provenance.description: Optional proof of randomness. Structure is implementation-defined (e.g. a drand beacon round, a video of a physical dice roll, etc.).
